title: Spain declassifies files on 1981 attempted coup in effort to dispel conspiracy theories
summary_full: The release comes on the same day as the death of the coup leader, Antonio Tejero Molina.
summary_public: The release comes on the same day as the death of the coup leader, Antonio Tejero Molina.
